00016 #import "chipmunk.h"
00017 #import "cocos2d.h"
00018 #import "SpaceManager.h"
00019 
00020 /*****
00021  Unfortunately we can't use multiple inheritance so we must
00022  use a pattern similar to strategy or envelope/letter, basically
00023  we've just added an instance of cpCCNode to whatever class
00024  we wish its functionality to be in. Then we create the same
00025  interface functions/properties and have then delegate to 
00026  our instance of cpCCNode, macros are defined below to help
00027  with this.
00028  
00029  -rkb
00030  *****/
00031  
00032 
00038 @protocol cpCCNodeDelegate<NSObject>
00039 @optional
00040 -(void) setShape:(cpShape*)shape;
00041 -(cpShape*) shape;
00042 -(void) setIntegrationDt:(cpFloat)dt;
00043 -(cpFloat) integrationDt;
00044 -(void) setSpaceManager:(SpaceManager*)spaceManager;
00045 -(SpaceManager*) spaceManager;
00046 -(void) setAutoFreeShape:(BOOL)autofree;
00047 -(BOOL) autoFreeShape;
00048 
00049 -(void) applyImpulse:(cpVect)impulse;
00050 -(void) applyForce:(cpVect)force;
00051 -(void) resetForces;
00052 @end
00053 
00060 @interface cpCCNode : NSObject {
00061 
00062 @protected
00063         cpShape*                _shape;
00064         SpaceManager*   _spaceManager;
00065         BOOL                    _ignoreRotation;
00066         BOOL            _autoFreeShape;
00067         cpFloat         _integrationDt; 
00068 }
00069 
00070 @property (readwrite,assign) BOOL ignoreRotation;
00071 @property (readwrite,assign) BOOL autoFreeShape;
00072 @property (readwrite,assign) cpFloat integrationDt;
00073 @property (readwrite,assign) cpShape *shape;
00074 @property (readwrite,assign) SpaceManager *spaceManager;
00075 
00076 - (id) initWithShape:(cpShape*)s;
00077 
00078 -(void)setRotation:(float)rot;
00079 -(void)setPosition:(cpVect)pos;
00080 
00081 -(void) applyImpulse:(cpVect)impulse;
00082 -(void) applyForce:(cpVect)force;
00083 -(void) resetForces;
00084 
00085 @end
00086 
00087 /* Macros for attempt at multiple inheritance */
00088 #define CPCCNODE_MEM_VARS cpCCNode *_implementation;
00089 
00090 //create our instance
00091 #define CPCCNODE_MEM_VARS_INIT(shape)   \
00092 _implementation = [[cpCCNode alloc] initWithShape:shape];\
00093 if (shape)\
00094         shape->data = self;
00095 
00096 //Not using this one; it screws up documentation
00097 #define CPCCNODE_FUNC_DECLARE   \
00098 @property (readwrite,assign) BOOL ignoreRotation;\
00099 @property (readwrite,assign) cpFloat integrationDt;\
00100 @property (readwrite,assign) BOOL autoFreeShape;\
00101 @property (readwrite,assign) cpShape *shape;\
00102 @property (readwrite,assign) SpaceManager *spaceManager;\
00103 -(void) applyImpulse:(cpVect)impulse;\
00104 -(void) applyForce:(cpVect)force;\
00105 -(void) resetForces;
00106 
00107 //The interface definitions
00108 #define CPCCNODE_FUNC_SRC       \
00109 - (void) dealloc\
00110 {\
00111         [_implementation release];\
00112         [super dealloc];\
00113 }\
00114 -(void)setRotation:(float)rot\
00115 {\
00116         [_implementation setRotation:rot];\
00117         [super setRotation:rot];\
00118 }\
00119 -(void)setPosition:(cpVect)pos\
00120 {\
00121         [_implementation setPosition:pos];\
00122         [super setPosition:pos];\
00123 }\
00124 -(void) applyImpulse:(cpVect)impulse\
00125 {\
00126         [_implementation applyImpulse:impulse];\
00127 }\
00128 -(void) applyForce:(cpVect)force\
00129 {\
00130         [_implementation applyForce:force];\
00131 }\
00132 \
00133 -(void) resetForces\
00134 {\
00135         [_implementation resetForces];\
00136 }\
00137 -(void) setIgnoreRotation:(BOOL)ignore\
00138 {\
00139         _implementation.ignoreRotation = ignore;\
00140 }\
00141 -(BOOL) ignoreRotation\
00142 {\
00143         return _implementation.ignoreRotation;\
00144 }\
00145 -(void) setIntegrationDt:(cpFloat)dt\
00146 {\
00147         _implementation.integrationDt = dt;\
00148 }\
00149 -(cpFloat) integrationDt\
00150 {\
00151         return _implementation.integrationDt;\
00152 }\
00153 -(void) setShape:(cpShape*)shape\
00154 {\
00155         _implementation.shape = shape;\
00156 }\
00157 -(cpShape*) shape\
00158 {\
00159         return _implementation.shape;\
00160 }\
00161 -(void) setSpaceManager:(SpaceManager*)spaceManager\
00162 {\
00163 _implementation.spaceManager = spaceManager;\
00164 }\
00165 -(SpaceManager*) spaceManager\
00166 {\
00167 return _implementation.spaceManager;\
00168 }\
00169 -(void) setAutoFreeShape:(BOOL)autoFree\
00170 {\
00171 _implementation.autoFreeShape = autoFree;\
00172 }\
00173 -(BOOL) autoFreeShape\
00174 {\
00175 return _implementation.autoFreeShape;\
00176 }
